paper_abstract: We present a rational expression for the trace of the multiplication map Times(r) : A -> A in a finite-dimensional algebra A := K[x(1),..., x(n)]/I in terms of the generalized Chow form of I. Here, I subset of K[x(1),...,x(n)] is a zero-dimensional ideal, K is a field of characteristic zero, and r(x(1),...,x(n)) a rational function whose denominator is not a zero divisor in A. If I is a complete intersection in the torus, we get numerator and denominator formulas for traces in terms of sparse resultants.
paper_title: Rational formulas for traces in zero-dimensional algebras
